name: wp-proud-theme
description: The ProudCity Wordpress theme built on top of [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com) and [Sage](https://roots.io/sage/). [ProudCity](http://proudcity.com) is a Wordpress platform for modern, standards-compliant municipal websites.

scripts.projectsetup: bower install && rm -rf bower_components/proudcity-patterns && git clone git@github.com:proudcity/proudcity-patterns.git bower_components/proudcity-patterns
